00039 /* FtpAccess() type codes */
00040 #define FTPLIB_DIR 1
00041 #define FTPLIB_DIR_VERBOSE 2
00042 #define FTPLIB_FILE_READ 3
00043 #define FTPLIB_FILE_WRITE 4
00044 
00045 /* FtpAccess() mode codes */
00046 #define FTPLIB_ASCII 'A'
00047 #define FTPLIB_IMAGE 'I'
00048 #define FTPLIB_TEXT FTPLIB_ASCII
00049 #define FTPLIB_BINARY FTPLIB_IMAGE
00050 
00051 /* connection modes */
00052 #define FTPLIB_PASSIVE 1
00053 #define FTPLIB_PORT 2
00054 
00055 /* connection option names */
00056 #define FTPLIB_CONNMODE 1
00057 #define FTPLIB_CALLBACK 2
00058 #define FTPLIB_IDLETIME 3
00059 #define FTPLIB_CALLBACKARG 4
00060 #define FTPLIB_CALLBACKBYTES 5

00066 typedef struct NetBuf netbuf;
00067 typedef int (*FtpCallback)(netbuf *nControl, int xfered, void *arg);

00076 /* #define ftplib_lastresp FtpLastResponse(DefaultNetbuf) */
